languages.text: "Разве так заканчивают свой путь прокторы? Умереть на мире-тюрьме или в пылу битвы с самыми опасными еретиками Коронуса — выбирать тебе".
"Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."
languages.original_text: "Разве так заканчивают свой путь прокторы? Умереть на мире-тюрьме или в пылу битвы с самыми опасными еретиками Коронуса — выбирать тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Is this how proctors end their journey? You may die on a penal world or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."
"Is this how proctors end their journey? You may die on a penal world or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."
"Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."
"Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."
"Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."
"Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

languages.text: 「代理人は、こんな形で人生を終えるものなのか？流刑惑星で死ぬか、コロヌス・エクスパンスの最も危険な異端者たちとの戦いの中で死ぬか。その選択は君次第だ」
languages.original_text: "Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: 「代理人は、こんな形で人生を終えるものなのか？流刑惑星で死ぬか、コロヌス・エクスパンスの最も危険な異端者たちとの戦いの中で死ぬか。その選択は君次第だ」

languages.text: "Beenden Proktoren so ihre Reise? Ihr könnt auf einer Strafwelt sterben oder in der Hitze der Schlacht gegen die gefährlichsten Ketzer der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Eure Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Beenden Proktoren so ihre Reise? Ihr könnt auf einer Strafwelt sterben oder in der Hitze der Schlacht gegen die gefährlichsten Ketzer der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Eure Entscheidung."

languages.text: « Est-ce ainsi que finissent les proctors ? Vous pouvez mourir dans un monde pénal ou en livrant un combat sans merci contre les hérétiques les plus dangereux des Étendues de Koronus. À vous de décider. »
languages.original_text: "Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce ainsi que finissent les proctors ? Vous pouvez mourir dans un monde pénal ou en livrant un combat sans merci contre les hérétiques les plus dangereux des Étendues de Koronus. À vous de décider. »

languages.text: «¿Así es como terminan su viaje los procuradores? Puede usted morir en un mundo penal, o en el fragor de la batalla contra los herejes más peligrosos de la Extensión de Koronus. La elección es suya».
languages.original_text: "Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: «¿Así es como terminan su viaje los procuradores? Puede usted morir en un mundo penal, o en el fragor de la batalla contra los herejes más peligrosos de la Extensión de Koronus. La elección es suya».

languages.text: “这是监察官该有的死法吗？你可以死在这个刑罚世界，也可以与科罗努斯扩区最邪恶的异端分子英勇战斗，壮烈牺牲。选择权在你手上。”
languages.original_text: "Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: “这是监察官该有的死法吗？你可以死在这个刑罚世界，也可以与科罗努斯扩区最邪恶的异端分子英勇战斗，壮烈牺牲。选择权在你手上。”

languages.text: "Üsteğmenlerin maceraları böyle mi bitiyormuş? İster ceza dünyasında istersen de Koronus Enginliği'nin en tehlikeli kâfirlerine karşı savaşın ortasında ölebilirsin. Seçim senin."
languages.original_text: "Is this how Proctors end their journey? You can die on a penal world, or in the heat of battle against the most dangerous heretics of the Koronus Expanse. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmenlerin maceraları böyle mi bitiyormuş? İster bir ceza dünyasında istersen de Koronus Enginliği'nin en tehlikeli kâfirlerine karşı bir savaşın ortasında ölebilirsin. Seçim senin."
